projects.name: Bookstore
projects.information: This is a bookstore. Where you can choose a book and add their number. You can go to the cart and view the total number and amount of books, and if necessary, remove the book from the list.
projects.stack: React, Redux, JavaScript(ES5, ES6) Git, GitHub, HTML, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.information: In this project, you can choose the amount of currency and convert to another. There is also a list of currencies of the current date. You can view the exchange rate by setting the desired date.
projects.stack: React, Redux, TypeScript, JavaScript(ES5, ES6) Git, GitHub, HTML, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).
